chat_history.message: Hello, my iPhone 12 has the above problem: It's been showing every day that the package will arrive today since 3 days. First, it says the package will arrive between 12-16 pm, and then when time passes, it says the package will arrive by the end of the day. However, nothing arrives and every day it claims to be delivered again. Even at UPS, I get no one contacted. Thank you for your help.

Hello!

The tracking status of this order has not changed in 4 business days and is now considered lost as per Back Market delivery policy. We have requested the Back Market certificate of non-receipt and picture of the customers ID to arrange a refund or a replacement.

 
Once all the paperwork has been gathered we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents

If at any point the delivery begins to move again a refund will not be issued and the order is considered to be late.

Best regards,
Ricardo-Filipe - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We have updated our logistics partner regarding this issue. In the meantime, please assist the customer in providing a handwritten CND and pictures of the customer's ID.

Regards,
Xt

Hello!


The parcel has not been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost parcel policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been attached to this message.

You can use the attached documents to investigate the matter with your delivery company

Please send a tracking link for a replacement within 24 hours or this order will be refunded

You can now blacklist the device.

Best regards,
Ricardo-Filipe - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Kindly assist the customer in ensuring that the CND is handwritten and please include the imei in the CND.

The imei of the device is 354447420222254

Regards,
Xt

Hello!


The parcel has not been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost parcel policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been attached to this message.

You can use the attached documents to investigate the matter with your delivery company

Please send a tracking link for a replacement within 24 hours or this order will be refunded

You can now blacklist the device.

Best regards,
Ricardo-Filipe - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We have shared the documents with our logistics partner to open an investigation. We would proceed with necessary actions when we receive a reply from them. Please do NOT refund the customer in the mean time. 

Thank you for your assistance.

Regards,
SY

Hello ecomobile,


We would like to inform you that, in accordance with our Quality Charter, we have refunded  the customer for deadline passed


Kind regards, Ricardo-Filipe from Back Market
